title: Hybrid Rock Electronic Orchestral Music Pack
description: Hybrid Rock Electronic Orchestral is a high-quality pack of 10 location-driven, beautifully-crafted tracks, written specifically for use in video games, created by composer Jake Bradford-Sharp
longDescription:
Hybrid Rock Electronic Orchestral contains 10 high-quality tracks, fitting scenes and situations from intense battles, uplifting flying sequences, dark dungeons, and more! The unique aspect of this pack? All the tracks are cleverly knitted together with themes intertwining throughout, so you can utilise the whole pack in your product, creating a flowing and cohesive experience.


Written with the JRPG genre in mind, the range and longevity of this pack are unbound. Each track comes with its own unique set of ready-made loops, prepared for use in any project, any genre, any time. Please see below for more details and descriptions of each track.


Please find a sample of the pack here!



TRACKLIST:



1. In The Field [04:32]

Intense & powerful, for the ultimate boss battle... Blasting brass, stunning strings, and powerful percussion conjure images of huge-scale battles, daring moments, and full immersion.



2. An Epic Journey [02:27]

Epic, thunderous, and climactic, this track has it all. Suited to big scenes, be they a castle, a battle, a journey... A truly huge thematic piece to soundtrack any game



3. A Life on The Hills [03:10]

Vertical rises and rocky roads are exemplified by pounding drums and driving rhythms. A climb to the top is soundtracked by this perfectly fitting track, fully capturing the mountainous mood.



4. Ice Dive [02:40]

Sparkling highs, slippery lows, and twinkly percussion give this track its icy edge - a perfect setting for those frost-bitten landscapes, snowy backdrops, and cold-snapping scenes.



5. The Desert Causeway [03:00]

The wind blowing mercilessly, sand getting in your eyes, the sun beating down on withered travellers... The long trek through the desert has never been easy... Succinctly encapsulated in this track, is that exact feeling. A perfect soundtrack to your trek through the desert.



06. Skyflight [02:30]

Is it a bird? Is it a plane? No, it's an uplifting and thoroughly exciting piece perfectly fitting for piloting an airship, flying around a world map, and experiencing the wonder that is flight!



07. The Abyss Tunnels [02:41]

Dark, brooding, and full of haunting mystery. Nothing gloomier than trudging through miles of sunless dungeon. This piece fits that setting without fail.



08. Trials & Tribulations [02:15]

Light and airy, this track embodies the essence of puzzles. Quirky, and off-kilter, but everyone knows they can figure it out eventually! Added mystery and intrigue help glue everything together.



09: The Battle Has Begun [03:14]

The perfect battle theme, complete with ups and downs, energetic drums, pulsing rhythms, and everything to keep the blood flowing through battle sequences.



10: Death of The Party [03:26]

That one enemy just had you pinned, eh? This track suits the loss, the defeat, and the deterioration of hope... The only option is to try again. Perhaps next time will be the final time?



LOOPS:

  1. In The Field - 8 Loops
  2. An Epic Journey - 6 Loops
  3. A Life on The Hills - 5 Loops
  4. Ice Dive - 5 Loops
  5. The Desert Causeway - 5 Loops
  6. Skyflight - 4 Loops
  7. The Abyss Tunnels - 3 Loops
  8. Trials & Tribulations - 5 Loops
  9. The Battle Has Begun - 5 Loops
  10. Death of The Party - 2 Loops


Jake is available for bespoke and custom work and is also available for custom edits on this pack. Please contact Jake directly at info@jakebradford-sharp.com or via his website for more information.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • 10 high-quality stereo WAV tracks, both mixed and mastered versions (16-bit / 44.1 kHz)
  • 48 pre-prepared loops, both mixed and mastered versions
  • Artwork included!

Number of Audio Wavs: 58

Number of Audio Cues: 58

Sample rate/bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 24bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 3 hours, 27 minutes, 32 seconds. 207.53 minutes total

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Link (or a description of where users can find) the documentation
